class.name: TextServerManager
class.brief_description: Manager for the font and complex text layout servers.
class.description: [TextServerManager] is the API backend for loading, enumeration and switching [TextServer]s. Note: Switching text server at runtime is possible, but will invalidate all fonts and text buffers. Make sure to unload all controls, fonts, and themes before doing so.

method.name: find_interface
method.description: Finds an interface by its name.

method.name: get_interface
method.description: Returns the interface registered at a given index.

method.name: get_interface_count
method.description: Returns the number of interfaces currently registered.

method.name: get_interface_features
method.description: Returns text server supported features (binary OR).

method.name: get_interface_name
method.description: Returns the interface name registered at a given index.

method.name: get_interfaces
method.description: Returns a list of available interfaces the index and name of each interface.

method.name: set_primary_interface
method.description: Sets (and initializes it if required) interface registered at a given index as the primary. Invalidates all references to the fonts and text buffers.
